summary: This is essentially three episodes of the TV series together. The villains included in this are Firearm, Flashpoint and Clockwise.
cast: Michelle Lintel|Frank Gorshin|Martin Kove|Allen Scotti|BT|Enya Flack|Steven Kravitz|Shane Powers|Guy Boyd|Shae Marks|Kimber West|Victoria Silvstedt|Scott Valentine
title: Sting of the Black Scorpion
